snippet.title: Super Mega Baseball 4 Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play EA SPORTS™ Super Mega Baseball™ 4 Ballpark Edition:  http://x.ea.com/smb4/buy.  
Receive three additional stadiums including Peril Point at launch, plus Ciudad de Colores and Castillo Arena in July and August respectively.

Super Mega Baseball 4 is now available featuring baseball Legend David "Big Papi" Ortiz and Super Mega icon Hammer Longballo as cover athletes, along with the immersive and vibrant gameplay that Super Mega Baseball players love. 

Experience an array of new and community-requested features across foundational game modes such as Exhibition, Franchise, Pennant Race, Season, and Online Leagues. New features include Franchise mode improvements, Shuffle Draft, expanded Player Traits, a new Team Chemistry system, and dozens of gameplay upgrades like automatic walks and runners, two-way players, expanded bullpens, customizable free agent pools, and more!


Subscribe for more SMB4 Content: https://www.youtube.com/@supermegabaseball
Follow us on our socials: 
Twitter: @supmegbaseball
IG: @supmegbaseball
Facebook: Super Mega Baseball 
TikTok: @supmegbaseball
Website: https://www.supermegabaseball.com 

#SuperMegaBaseball4 #TheLegendsAreBack
